body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Wayne Henderson and the customer's name is Samantha Rogers.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Wayne Henderson and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Wayne, I'm Samantha Rogers. I'm looking to get some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Samantha! What specific information are you looking for?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in the different models you have and their prices.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! We have a wide range of models available. To better assist you, could I please have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Samantha! And could you also provide me with your current zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's eight zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I will make sure to send you all the details about our motorcycle models and their pricing to your email. Is there anything else you would like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that’s all for now. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Samantha! Thank you for your time, and I look forward to assisting you further. Have a wonderful day!
